name: expo-docs-mcp
description: MCP server for semantic search of pre-indexed Expo documentation. Search through Expo SDK documentation using AI-powered semantic search with version-specific results.

scripts.build: npm run clean && npm run build:server
scripts.build:server: ncc build src/mcp-server.ts -o dist/server --target es2022 --external hnswlib-node && mv dist/server/index.js dist/mcp-server.js && rm -rf dist/server && mkdir -p dist/node_modules && cp -r node_modules/hnswlib-node dist/node_modules/ && cp -r data/* dist/ 2>/dev/null || true
scripts.dev:build:cli: ncc build src/cli.ts -o dist/cli --target es2022 && mv dist/cli/index.js dist/cli.js && rm -rf dist/cli
